page.title: 10Ryedale Sports Club
page.content: This was set up in 1960 by a group of cricket players. Since then it has expanded,and now caters for cricket,football, tennis, hockey, table-tennis and netball. The club, which has 250 subscribers a year, is quite successful with about 25 teams altogether. {Funds.}The club is funded entirely by subscriptions and fund-raising events.The secretary of the club said that money raised by each section is pooled in one large treasury.This ensures a high standard of upkeep for the whole club, which is not the system used in some where those who raised the money believe it should be spent in support of their chosen activity.
